abstract: Ron Lieber Your Money column discusses Pimco's RealRetirement target date funds, which use hedges to avoid major losses when stocks crash, helping three-year returns; points out, however, they also have fewer stocks than competitors, which can hurt when stocks are doing especially well.
snippet: A new kind of target-date fund from Pimco puts less money in stocks, offers more inflation protection and invests in hedges to protect against large losses.
lead_paragraph: A new kind of target-date fund from Pimco puts less money in stocks, offers more inflation protection and invests in hedges to protect against large losses.

headline.main: Retirement Funds Built for Skittish Times
headline.seo: Pimco Retirement Funds Are Built for Skittish Times
headline.print_headline: Retirement Funds Built for Skittish Times
